short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Rick and Morty on interdimensional adventures with fun visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the multiverse with the Rick and Morty-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A fun, quirky interface inspired by the adventurous and unpredictable world of Rick and Morty.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that mirrors the eccentric style of the show.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Rick and Morty-themed games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Add exciting features to your browsing experience with the unpredictable energy of Rick and Morty.
